snippet: After more than a decade of denials, Lance Armstrong is set to give a limited confession to Oprah Winfrey, but will not provide much detail of the doping.
abstract: Lance Armstrong, after more than a decade of denials, is set to confess his drug use during interview with Oprah Winfrey.
lead_paragraph: After more than a decade of denials, Lance Armstrong is set to give a limited confession to Oprah Winfrey, but will not provide much detail of the doping.

headline.seo: On TV Show, Armstrong Is Planning to Confess His Drug Use to Winfrey
headline.main: On Winfrey’s Show, Armstrong Is Planning to Confess Drug Use
headline.print_headline: Armstrong Is Said to Be Planning Confession in an Interview With Winfrey
